'''[[Structs:Screen|Screen]]'''
native static void '''ClearTransform'''()
== Usage == Removes the transformation currently being applied to the screen. See [[Classes:Shape2D#Shape2DTransform|Shape2DTransform]] for more information.
'''Warning:''' This can only be called from within functions that are specifically designed to draw HUD elements (e.g. BaseStatusBar's [[Draw]] or EventHandler's RenderOverlay).
== Examples == See [[Classes:Shape2D#Examples|'''Shape2D''']].
